name: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Currently working at LeadSimple, a US-based seed-stage Saas startup, the leading CRM and Operations software for property management companies in the United States.

Rails + GraphQL in the backend, React + Typescript + Relay in the Frontend. Also, working on a new software built with Elixir + Phoenix to handle the synchronization between the company data and external property management software.

name: Software Engineer
description: Backend Software Engineer, working with technologies such as NodeJS, Python+Django, SLS Framework (with AWS, using Lambda, SQS, and Dynamo).

name: AI/DL Researcher
description:
Worked with machine learning-related research, more specifically in the Graph Neural Networks field, with a CNPq scholarship, supervised by Prof. Dr. Luis Lamb and Prof. Dr. Anderson Rocha Tavares.

My undergraduate thesis titled "On the Evolution of AI and Machine Learning: Analyses of Impact, Leadership and Influence over the Last Decades" was written during this scholarship. I've published my academic research at the Brazilian Conference on Intelligent Systems and the Journal of Applied Logics.

name: Software Engineer
description:
Developed the PIUBS Portal for a Cooperation Project between UFRGS and the Brazilian Health Ministry.

The portal consisted of 2 different services intended to solve conflicts between companies and UBS's (Brazilian health centers) which might occur during the implementation of the PIUBS system countrywide.
